record.alternateTitle1: Sonia Shankman Orthogenic School for Emotionally Disturbed Children
record.description: [Photographic copy of a drawing] of Phillip Pekow Hall, the $360,000 adolescent addition to the Orthogenic School for Emotionally Disturbed Children, at the University of Chicago. Ground will be broken on Wednesday, May 8, 1963 at 11:30 AM. Mr. Pekow, Associate Justice Arthur Goldberg, George W. Beadle, University of Chicago president, Bruno Bettelheim, school principal, and Carl Devoe, president, University of Chicago Foundation for Emotionally Disturbed Children will be participating in the ceremonies.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
